Package xxl.core.relational.query.predicates

Class Summary
Comparisons This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a comparison predicate node in a directed acyclic graph.
LogicalConstants This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a logical constant node in a directed acyclic graph.
LogicalOperations This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a logical operation node in a directed acyclic graph.
Predicates This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a predicate node in a directed acyclic graph.
 

Enum Summary
Comparisons.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a comparison's global metadata for identifing the comparison's type.
LogicalConstants.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a logical constant's global metadata for identifing the logical constant's type.
LogicalOperations.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a logical operation's global metadata for identifing the operation's type.

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
Send an email to xxl-request@lists.uni-marburg.de without subject and the word \"subscribe\" in the message body.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
